name: Tai Orathai
description: '''Tai Orathai''' ({{langx|th|ต่าย อรทัย}}; born March 27, 1980) is a Thai female [[luk thung|Luk Thung]] singer from [[Ubon Ratchatani]], [[Thailand]]. She is also known as "Sao Dok Yaah" (Miss Grass Flower). The name Sao Dok Yaah comes from her debut album. She graduated with a Bachelor's degree in the Faculty of Mass Communication from [[Ramkhamhaeng University]].
